name: Sweet Fight
description:
Save your Candy Bowl from Halloween Monsters trying to Attack it! 

Summon Sweets to fight them of and protect your Bowl and use the Shop to unlock new Sweets using your Candy Coins and Upgrade them!

The Controls Are Simple

A and D to move left and right

Use your mouse to click the buttons to summon sweets and upgrade them

Fullscreen Recommended 

This game was a self-imposed game jam made within the month of October. There are many improvements that could be made but no further changes to the game will happen after the 31st of October 2022. Any feedback is still appreciated
